title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Comments on Lula Winning Brazilian Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, on 31 October 2022.
content:
Congratulations to [@LulaOficial](https://twitter.com/LulaOficial) on his victory in Brazil’s election. I look forward to working together on the issues that matter to the UK and Brazil, from growing the global economy to protecting the planet’s natural resources and promoting democratic values.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
